description: Access comprehensive U.S. weather and aviation data including forecasts, alerts, advisories, radar, and station observations. Build location-aware experiences with points, zones, offices, and product lookups. Manage tasks with create, update, list, and delete operations for todos.

capabilities.name: 1e0edd2a-8d53-4355-805f-54b7e5555725
capabilities.description: **Retrieves a complete list of all todo items** from the system. This endpoint returns all todos regardless of their completion status or owner, making it useful for displaying comprehensive todo lists or performing bulk operations.

capabilities.name: 55ee860b-fe7e-4d66-a228-bb5320c3305d
capabilities.description: **Creates a new todo item** with the provided details. The todo will be assigned a unique ID automatically and can include a title, completion status, and user association. This is the primary endpoint for adding new tasks to the system.

capabilities.name: 4569a607-338e-4d66-80f7-17f911778b1d
capabilities.description: **Updates an existing todo item** by its unique identifier. You can modify any combination of the todo's properties including title, completion status, and user assignment. All changes are applied atomically to ensure data consistency.

capabilities.name: 888a8d15-aa30-45fe-8957-b07a8bcdd7ca
capabilities.description: **Permanently removes a todo item** from the system using its unique identifier. This operation cannot be undone, so use with caution. The endpoint will return a 404 error if the specified todo does not exist.

capabilities.name: alerts_query
capabilities.description: Returns all alerts

capabilities.name: alerts_active
capabilities.description: Returns all currently active alerts

capabilities.name: alerts_active_count
capabilities.description: Returns info on the number of active alerts

capabilities.name: alerts_active_zone
capabilities.description: Returns active alerts for the given NWS public zone or county

capabilities.name: alerts_active_area
capabilities.description: Returns active alerts for the given area (state or marine area)

capabilities.name: alerts_active_region
capabilities.description: Returns active alerts for the given marine region

capabilities.name: alerts_types
capabilities.description: Returns a list of alert types

capabilities.name: alerts_single
capabilities.description: Returns a specific alert

capabilities.name: cwsu
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about a Center Weather Service Unit

capabilities.name: cwas
capabilities.description: Returns a list of Center Weather Advisories from a CWSU

capabilities.name: cwa
capabilities.description: Returns a list of Center Weather Advisories from a CWSU

capabilities.name: sigmetQuery
capabilities.description: Returns a list of SIGMET/AIRMETs

capabilities.name: sigmetsByATSU
capabilities.description: Returns a list of SIGMET/AIRMETs for the specified ATSU

capabilities.name: sigmetsByATSUByDate
capabilities.description: Returns a list of SIGMET/AIRMETs for the specified ATSU for the specified date

capabilities.name: sigmet
capabilities.description: Returns a specific SIGMET/AIRMET

capabilities.name: glossary
capabilities.description: Returns glossary terms

capabilities.name: gridpoint
capabilities.description: Returns raw numerical forecast data for a 2.5km grid area

capabilities.name: gridpoint_forecast
capabilities.description: Returns a textual forecast for a 2.5km grid area

capabilities.name: gridpoint_forecast_hourly
capabilities.description: Returns a textual hourly forecast for a 2.5km grid area

capabilities.name: gridpoint_stations
capabilities.description: Returns a list of observation stations usable for a given 2.5km grid area

capabilities.name: icons
capabilities.description: Returns a forecast icon. Icon services in API are deprecated.

capabilities.name: iconsDualCondition
capabilities.description: Returns a forecast icon. Icon services in API are deprecated.

capabilities.name: icons_summary
capabilities.description: Returns a list of icon codes and textual descriptions. Icon services in API are deprecated.

capabilities.name: satellite_thumbnails
capabilities.description: Returns a thumbnail image for a satellite region. Image services in API are deprecated.

capabilities.name: station_observation_list
capabilities.description: Returns a list of observations for a given station

capabilities.name: station_observation_latest
capabilities.description: Returns the latest observation for a station

capabilities.name: station_observation_time
capabilities.description: Returns a single observation.

capabilities.name: tafs
capabilities.description: Returns Terminal Aerodrome Forecasts for the specified airport station.

capabilities.name: taf
capabilities.description: Returns a single Terminal Aerodrome Forecast.

capabilities.name: obs_stations
capabilities.description: Returns a list of observation stations.

capabilities.name: obs_station
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about a given observation station

capabilities.name: office
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about a NWS forecast office

capabilities.name: office_headline
capabilities.description: Returns a specific news headline for a given NWS office

capabilities.name: office_headlines
capabilities.description: Returns a list of news headlines for a given NWS office

capabilities.name: point
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about a given latitude/longitude point

capabilities.name: point_stations
capabilities.description: Returns a list of observation stations for a given point

capabilities.name: radar_servers
capabilities.description: Returns a list of radar servers

capabilities.name: radar_server
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about a given radar server

capabilities.name: radar_stations
capabilities.description: Returns a list of radar stations

capabilities.name: radar_station
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about a given radar station

capabilities.name: radar_station_alarms
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about a given radar station alarms

capabilities.name: radar_queue
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about a given radar queue

capabilities.name: radar_profiler
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about a given radar wind profiler

capabilities.name: products_query
capabilities.description: Returns a list of text products

capabilities.name: product_locations
capabilities.description: Returns a list of valid text product issuance locations

capabilities.name: product_types
capabilities.description: Returns a list of valid text product types and codes

capabilities.name: product
capabilities.description: Returns a specific text product

capabilities.name: products_type
capabilities.description: Returns a list of text products of a given type

capabilities.name: products_type_locations
capabilities.description: Returns a list of valid text product issuance locations for a given product type

capabilities.name: location_products
capabilities.description: Returns a list of valid text product types for a given issuance location

capabilities.name: products_type_location
capabilities.description: Returns a list of text products of a given type for a given issuance location

capabilities.name: latest_product_type_location
capabilities.description: Returns latest text products of a given type for a given issuance location with product text

capabilities.name: zone_list
capabilities.description: Returns a list of zones

capabilities.name: zone_list_type
capabilities.description: Returns a list of zones of a given type

capabilities.name: zone
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about a given zone

capabilities.name: zone_forecast
capabilities.description: Returns the current zone forecast for a given zone

capabilities.name: zone_obs
capabilities.description: Returns a list of observations for a given zone

capabilities.name: zone_stations
capabilities.description: Returns a list of observation stations for a given zone
